posts.post_title: Tinker  Port El Principe DeGales and-CLarke  Tip- Top..
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dan Koteles
Joe Tinker Portrait PSA 6 -EL Principe DeGales back. This is a very rare combo as a Tinker port in a 6 is nearly impossible by itself, but with an ElPrincipe DeGales back ?

FRED CLARKE TIP TOP- The best 2 in existence. SGC did this one no favors as it is the bst 2 on the planet....an extremely clean card .A bump in grade make this a likely 3500.00 card and another impossible to find. 2650.00 SOLD SOLD SOLD SOLD

CREDIT CARDS ACCEPTED AT MY OFFICE IF I KNOW YOU !!! 810-715-0024

I can be emailed at my office at Dankoteles@yahoo.com. CREDIT CARDS ACCEPTED IF I KNOW YOU

810-715-0024 to call. Thank you xoxo Dan Koteles

let me mention that my scanner doesnt do any justice to the colors. I have 3 really nice Tinkers and this one sickens the other 3 in color .It looks and is the most wicked Red card I have ever owned. I can easily promise satisfaction of the card and dont want to sell it, but the things coming up dictates otherwise.This is and looks 2-3 times better then the scan. 

I can do a credit card at my business if still interested. 810 715 0024....call me anyway at this number after 11:15 today est.

Thanks again
Dan
